comments:
Using suse 9.1 and eclipse 3.0 M9 with gtk2

I was trying to synchronizing an old repository due to use a clean one due to
error with sysdeo plugin and eclipse just stopped responding:

Try changing modes in the Synchronize View and then try again. This is a 
really strange problem because it means that we created a node that doesn't 
have an associated resource.
Investigate for 3.0.
Couldn't find the culprit but instead added checks for null syncinfo.
